MWC.GUI

Interface Layers.DataListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Layers.DataListener2
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnalysisTote, AWTTote, DataListenerAdaptor, SwingLayerManager, SwingTote
    Enclosing class:
    Layers

    public static interface Layers.DataListener
    interface to be implemented by classes intending to watch the full set of data for this scenarion

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dataExtended(Layers theData)
      a new piece of data has been edited
      void dataModified(Layers theData, Layer changedLayer)
      some part of the data has been modified (not necessarily formatting though)
      void dataReformatted(Layers theData, Layer changedLayer)
      some kind of formatting has been applied

    • Method Detail

      • dataExtended

        void dataExtended(Layers theData)
        a new piece of data has been edited
        Parameters:
        theData - the Layers which have had something edited

      • dataModified

        void dataModified(Layers theData,
                  Layer changedLayer)
        some part of the data has been modified (not necessarily formatting though)
        Parameters:
        theData - the Layers containing the item of data which has been modified
        changedLayer - a layer which has changed (or null if not known)

      • dataReformatted

        void dataReformatted(Layers theData,
                     Layer changedLayer)
        some kind of formatting has been applied
        Parameters:
        theData - the Layers containing the data which has been reformatted
        changedLayer - a layer which has changed (or null if not known)
